2s: In  the  above  circumstances,  this  Court  is  of the  view  that the  failure  on  the

column2: part of the  USAB  to consider the grounds  urged  by  the  Petitioner amounts to

2s: an  error  on  the  face  of the  record  and  that  the  said  decision  is
quashed  by a Writ of Certiorari.
